definitions.definition: act as a friend to (someone) by offering help or support.
examples: make friends with, make a friend of; Morelook after, keep an eye on; be of service to, lend a helping hand to, help, protect; side with, stand by, encourage "a charming story in which the toys befriend one another"Morelook after, keep an eye on; be of service to, lend a helping hand to, help, protect; side with, stand by, encourage a charming story in which the toys befriend one another
